Step by step instructions for Plasma cutter are almost finished. They will be uploaded in a couple of days. Stay tuned!

Support

Should you need any help with GoodEnoughCNC systems, get in touch with others involved in the project and Institute IRNAS team via:

  • CHAT – Join our chat group for real time collaboration with IRNAS team members and others working on GoodEnoughCNC systems.
  • FORUM – We recommend using a forum for help, so the information will be preserved.
